daily_fact: A Chinatown passport photographer has gained viral fame for their unique and artistic approach, showcasing the vibrant culture of the neighborhood while providing a valuable service to the community.
topline_md: Recent updates in NYC include tragic flooding resulting in two fatalities, a pedestrian fatality in Brooklyn, and swift restoration of gas service after a leak. Additionally, the City Council approved the redevelopment of Kingsbridge Armory, while discussions on housing policies and public safety continue amid ongoing challenges.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- NYC flooding has resulted in the deaths of two men in flooded basements in Manhattan and Brooklyn. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- A man was killed and another injured after being struck by a Ford vehicle in Brooklyn; the driver remained on scene. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Gas service has been restored at 140 Claremont Avenue following a reported leak. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMisgFBVV95cUxQeXUwZmpLbzByT1FOa3pCYkNxWkstT2ZKemd1ZFJGa0lCWDJSeVBSMlNJR3lNRDRSUHh4VE8yNGJleHhHNE0tNVlPNjIyblpaY200ZGVVWWVfM0NmYjY4UEtNNnpiZEtReFdOZ0xBYTJCekEzTXhRYmlCMXBybnQtaTlCM0t4eFFETV90dDE0bHI1c2c2bEpvUXhfVEcyVml4UnFrVGdFS3dfQkVjVGp6M1h3?oc=5)

civics_politics.title: Civics & Politics
civics_politics.summary_md:
### Civics & Politics

- Cuomo proposes modifications to the controversial City of Yes plan, acknowledging differences in the outer boroughs. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- City Council approves redevelopment of Kingsbridge Armory in the Bronx, aiming to revitalize the area. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirAFBVV95cUxNYVdkVnU1X1NiZjYycENOMkFzZlJ0c1BJV29oY21hS3Z1U2E5ODh2cWxtUXY0N2hrMmY2MXdHTmpneW85U0lMbV80NHBuT3c3VzFtaEt0WnRielpSNEJCdGl1ajZCMDhESS12RmVkVVBtRGpHdG5HU3N1Z0Y2ZGZLS2dkSTd6RkxFWXF2VkpWSV9kaFJ0cmZzQnZneDJuLTdhc1lzZ2x5cmdXYS0x?oc=5)
